QueryResult.text: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN frequency = 1 THEN expiration_date - 7 WHEN frequency = 3 THEN ADD_MONTHS(expiration_date,-1) ELSE expiration_date END) ROLLOVER_DATE FROM prj_blb_slicerequests WHERE is_dwh_request = 1 AND request_name IN ('baseline::current_team_cost::dwh_month', 'baseline::current_team_cost::dwh_week', 'baseline::current_team_usage::dwh_month', 'baseline::current_team_usage::dwh_week', 'team::alloccost_curve::dwh_month', 'team::alloccost_curve::dwh_week', 'MONTHLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC', 'WEEKLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC', 'team::hardallccost_curve::dwh_month', 'team::hardallccost_curve::dwh_week', 'MONTHLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE', 'WEEKLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE')
